26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_BOX_SHAPE_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_BOX_SHAPE_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <reactphysics3d/collision/shapes/ConvexPolyhedronShape.h>
31 #include <reactphysics3d/mathematics/mathematics.h>
32 
34 namespace reactphysics3d {
35 
36 // Declarations
37 class CollisionBody;
38 class DefaultAllocator;
39 class PhysicsCommon;
40 
41 // Class BoxShape
48 class BoxShape : public ConvexPolyhedronShape {
49 
50  protected :
51 
52  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
53 
55  Vector3 mHalfExtents;
56 
58  PhysicsCommon& mPhysicsCommon;
59 
60  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
61 
63  BoxShape(const Vector3& halfExtents, MemoryAllocator& allocator, PhysicsCommon& physicsCommon);
64 
66  virtual Vector3 getLocalSupportPointWithoutMargin(const Vector3& direction) const override;
67 
69  virtual bool testPointInside(const Vector3& localPoint, Collider* collider) const override;
70 
72  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, Collider* collider, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
73 
75  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
76 
78  virtual ~BoxShape() override = default;
79 
80  public :
81 
82  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
83 
85  BoxShape(const BoxShape& shape) = delete;
86 
88  BoxShape& operator=(const BoxShape& shape) = delete;
89 
91  Vector3 getHalfExtents() const;
92 
94  void setHalfExtents(const Vector3& halfExtents);
95 
97  virtual void getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const override;
98 
100  virtual Vector3 getLocalInertiaTensor(decimal mass) const override;
101 
103  virtual decimal getVolume() const override;

110 
112  virtual uint32 getNbVertices() const override;

116 
118  virtual uint32 getNbHalfEdges() const override;

128 
130  virtual Vector3 getCentroid() const override;
131 
133  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
134 
135  // ----- Friendship ----- //
136 
137  friend class PhysicsCommon;
138 };
139 
140 // Return the extents of the box
144 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 BoxShape::getHalfExtents() const {
145  return mHalfExtents;
146 }
147 
148 // Set the half-extents of the box
151 
154 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void BoxShape::setHalfExtents(const Vector3& halfExtents) {
155  mHalfExtents = halfExtents;
156 
157  notifyColliderAboutChangedSize();
158 }
159 
160 // Return the local bounds of the shape in x, y and z directions
162 
166 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void BoxShape::getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const {
167 
168  // Maximum bounds
169  max = mHalfExtents;
170 
171  // Minimum bounds
172  min = -max;
173 }
174 
175 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
176 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t BoxShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
177  return sizeof(BoxShape);
178 }
179 
180 // Return a local support point in a given direction without the object margin
181 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 BoxShape::getLocalSupportPointWithoutMargin(const Vector3& direction) const {
182 
183  return Vector3(direction.x < decimal(0.0) ? -mHalfExtents.x : mHalfExtents.x,
184  direction.y < decimal(0.0) ? -mHalfExtents.y : mHalfExtents.y,
185  direction.z < decimal(0.0) ? -mHalfExtents.z : mHalfExtents.z);
186 }
187 
188 // Return true if a point is inside the collision shape
189 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool BoxShape::testPointInside(const Vector3& localPoint, Collider* /*collider*/) const {
190  return (localPoint.x < mHalfExtents[0] && localPoint.x > -mHalfExtents[0] &&
191  localPoint.y < mHalfExtents[1] && localPoint.y > -mHalfExtents[1] &&
192  localPoint.z < mHalfExtents[2] && localPoint.z > -mHalfExtents[2]);
193 }
194 
195 // Return the number of faces of the polyhedron
196 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 BoxShape::getNbFaces() const {
197  return 6;
198 }
199 
200 // Return the number of vertices of the polyhedron
201 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 BoxShape::getNbVertices() const {
202  return 8;
203 }
204 
205 // Return the position of a given vertex
206 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 BoxShape::getVertexPosition(uint32 vertexIndex) const {
207  assert(vertexIndex < getNbVertices());
208 
209  switch(vertexIndex) {
210  case 0: return Vector3(-mHalfExtents.x, -mHalfExtents.y, mHalfExtents.z);
211  case 1: return Vector3(mHalfExtents.x, -mHalfExtents.y, mHalfExtents.z);
212  case 2: return Vector3(mHalfExtents.x, mHalfExtents.y, mHalfExtents.z);
213  case 3: return Vector3(-mHalfExtents.x, mHalfExtents.y, mHalfExtents.z);
214  case 4: return Vector3(-mHalfExtents.x, -mHalfExtents.y, -mHalfExtents.z);
215  case 5: return Vector3(mHalfExtents.x, -mHalfExtents.y, -mHalfExtents.z);
216  case 6: return Vector3(mHalfExtents.x, mHalfExtents.y, -mHalfExtents.z);
217  case 7: return Vector3(-mHalfExtents.x, mHalfExtents.y, -mHalfExtents.z);
218  }
219 
220  assert(false);
221  return Vector3::zero();
222 }
223 
224 // Return the normal vector of a given face of the polyhedron
225 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 BoxShape::getFaceNormal(uint32 faceIndex) const {
226  assert(faceIndex < getNbFaces());
227 
228  switch(faceIndex) {
229  case 0: return Vector3(0, 0, 1);
230  case 1: return Vector3(1, 0, 0);
231  case 2: return Vector3(0, 0, -1);
232  case 3: return Vector3(-1, 0, 0);
233  case 4: return Vector3(0, -1, 0);
234  case 5: return Vector3(0, 1, 0);
235  }
236 
237  assert(false);
238  return Vector3::zero();
239 }
240 
241 // Return the centroid of the box
242 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 BoxShape::getCentroid() const {
243  return Vector3::zero();
244 }
245 
246 // Compute and return the volume of the collision shape
247 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal BoxShape::getVolume() const {
248  return 8 * mHalfExtents.x * mHalfExtents.y * mHalfExtents.z;
249 }
250 
251 // Return the string representation of the shape
252 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE std::string BoxShape::to_string() const {
253  return "BoxShape{extents=" + mHalfExtents.to_string() + "}";
254 }
255 
256 // Return the number of half-edges of the polyhedron
257 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 BoxShape::getNbHalfEdges() const {
258  return 24;
259 }
260 
261 }
262 
263 #endif
